name: Meteorite (Rajcsányi László (WLS))
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: John P. Shay - Solar Software Ltd. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1986. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Your ship is lost in a meteorite field, your only hope is to blast them with your lasers.
You can play in two different game styles. In hard mode: Steer your ship with the thrust button it will move in the direction it is pointing. But be careful! If your ship is standing diagonally, you can't fire. Rotate your ship with the left and right keys.
In the easy operator mode, you can control your ship with the arrow keys. No diagonal movement here.
You have 3 ships per game.

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

EASY MODE

Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT
Fire: Z

HARD MODE

Start the game: Start
Left: Cursor LEFT       
Right: Cursor RIGHT
Thrust: Cursor UP or B
Fire: A

EASY MODE

Start the game: Start
Move: Cursor UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT
Fire: Z

HARD MODE

Start the game: StartLeft: Cursor LEFT       
Right: Cursor RIGHT
Thrust: Cursor UP or X
Fire: Z
